means: （使）活跃( perk的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The recent demand for houses has perked up the prices.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近对住房的需求使房价上涨了.

sentence.Network_en: You've perked up since this morning.
sentence.Network_cn: 你今天上午精神就好多了.

sentence.Network_en: The horse perked up its head.
sentence.Network_cn: 那匹马精神抖擞地昂起头来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: she perked up when her boyfriend arrived .她男朋友一到她就精神起来了。
Coffee is being perked and will be ready in two minutes ., 咖啡正在滤煮 , 过两分钟就好.
Surveys of German consumer confidence have also perked up this year ., 调查显示 , 今年德国的消费者信心也提振了起来.

list.abs: 中央公园咖啡馆（Central Perk）是美国著名电视情景喜剧《老友记》（《Friends》）虚构出的一家位于美国纽约市格林威治村的咖 …
纽约中央咖啡馆(Central Perk)旁边的公寓里，住着莫妮卡和她的两位对门邻居乔伊和钱德勒。罗斯是莫妮卡的哥哥兼钱德勒的大学死 …
热门商业术语中英文对照 [南方网教育频道] ... curb： 抑制；控制 perk up： 振作起来 cap： 限制.
老友记得１－５季个人笔记A_徐长峰_新浪博客 ... inflict some pain 减轻痛苦 perk up 活跃起来;振作起来 geist 感性,理智感受性.
perkan 厚毛织物perking switch 快动开关perlapine 哌拉平

entry.def: Perks are special benefits that are given to people who have a particular job or belong to a particular group.

example.ex: ...a company car, private medical insurance and other perks...
example.tran: 公司配车、提供私人医疗保险以及其他额外待遇

example.ex: One of the perks of being a student is cheap travel.
example.tran: 当学生的好处之一是旅行购票可以优惠。

means.word_mean: 1. (especially of ears) quickly lifted up or out in attention; `perched' is obsolete;

auth_sentence.content: The anger released some juices and perked him up.
auth_sentence.res_content: The anger released some juices and perked him up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The anger released some juices and perked him up.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Crawford initially perked up, then resumed his decline.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Crawford initially perked up, then resumed his decline.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Crawford initially perked up, then resumed his decline.

auth_sentence.content: I just perked some coffee...Would you like a cup?
auth_sentence.res_content: I just perked some coffee...Would you like a cup?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I just perked some coffee...Would you like a cup?
